name: Preludio
additionalNotes:
A limited edition cigar made for the millennium celebration, the 3rd Millennium is a mild Dominican with a Dominican Sun Grown wrapper. This cigar uses aged tobacco from every decade during the 1900's. Obviously there is a dwindling supply of early 20th Century aged tobacco and when it’s gone, the 3rd Millennium’s will be also. Good thing cigars last indefinitely in your humidor!
